title: Thankful to you for your favour
comment: I am very thankful to you for your favour that you showed by accepting my application for a loan and your bank has approved my loan. I was in great need of money. I must appreciate that your bank has a speedy procedure for loan approval and every step is taken on merit. I also wish to thank Moneymithra for their support and services in helping me identify the right bank and process. Please accept my regards and thanks for your favor once again. I shall always remember your kindness.
name: Ambika Nazareth

title: Keep up the good work
comment: I am Mr. Dinakar from Bangalore I am very much thankful for your timely support to get my Personal loan of 10-Lac which was very much needed on that time and I was really don’t have an Idea that it can be done with in a 3-days I was suppose to ask my friend for loan but mean time I have got a call from Mr. Raju from your Money Mithra & supported me to get my Personal loan on time... Keep up the good work.
name: Dinakar K

title: Really happy
comment: I am really happy to say thank you for your on time support to get my Personal loan of 15-Lac I was keep on asking my friends to help me with some reference to take a personal loan at that time Mr. Pradeep had called me and I have give him all the required documents and he help to get my loan approved & I have received the loan amount with in 4- days ... I am really happy to get good service from Mr. Pradeep from Money Mithra 'Thanks a lot for your timely support Keep up the good work always'
name: Lavanya Joshi

title: Good service
comment: I am Mr. Kailash Chavan I am really happy to say Mr. Jagadeesh from Money Mithra has give me a good service to get my personal loan of 7-Lac ... I had a critical time I didn’t had a money for my Marriage so he helped me to get the personal loan with in 4-days it give me a confidence to give reference to Mr. Jagadeesh to help my friends on the same.
name: Kailash Chavan
